main.java.de.htwsaar.dfs.bootstrap.resource

Class WebclientResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.de.htwsaar.dfs.bootstrap.resource.WebclientResource

  • @Path(value="/")
public class WebclientResource
extends java.lang.Object
    The webclient resource class of Projekt-DFS backend. It makes possible to load the login-screen via browser, does not matter which device you are using
    Author:
    Julian Einspenner

      • readFile

        private static java.lang.String readFile(java.lang.String name)
        Reads a file and gives it back to the client as a string. Necessary for having an exported jar-file of the server.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the file which is going to be read
        Returns:
        the file content as a string

      • readImage

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage readImage(java.lang.String name)

        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the image which is going to be read
        Returns:
        the image
